report design

Description:
Exception is thrown out when open report designed on build 2.1.1.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070921-1004

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached report design.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

This caused by incorrect manifest file of org.w3c.dom.svg plugin. After change corresponding line to:

Import-Package: org.w3c.dom,org.w3c.dom.smil

it works ok.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 201376 ***
